replies.body: I used to go to headspace and I feel like I owe them for putting my life back on track, they really helped. This is an amazing cause and organisation. Great job Riot & Headspace for collaborating.

Kinda unbelievable to think the league community cares that much about mental health when the toxic mofo's are the ones telling you to go and kill yourself.. I'm apparently a worthless piece of fkn shit that should get cancer.. All because I made a mistake in lane.. I dunno.. I just don't believe it.. 
Good to see Headspace is on board now,, actually really need their support.. No thanks to this league community.
For Australia if you call 000 from a mobile it can cost money. 112 is what you call from mobiles for free. :)
If I'm dying idgaf which number i call

Last time my house was on fire it cost me almost 3 dollars to call 000! waste of money let the fucker burn
Call 112, i've saved thousands this year alone!
this is actually one of the smartest moves ive seen a gaming company make, riot always satisfies on a PR level. fix yo game tho. haha <3

yep, I cant believe a mental health concerned entity wants to encourage people to join the most toxic demoralizing degrading depressing games on the internet.  When Most games in and of themselfs are a cause of mental harm as they are an addictive substance

I really do hope this is more then some good PR move. As someone who has talked to Head Space a lot over the years, its definitely a serious thing that shouldn't be used as a 'good guy riot' move. Please don't let it be something like that.
Yeah, I think it is a good idea and I also don't want this to be a "good guy" move either {{sticker:sg-miss-fortune}}

Nice! This is a really good idea and maybe this will help in the long run, if people don't start trolling headspace after this, however good job Riot OCE <3 I think that headspace was a good idea as of all the toxic people in this game, so I really think that this might help others who need help {{sticker:sg-ahri-2}}
Mental health company signing up with a toxic addictive depression increasing "substance" /Slow Clap.
Or they realise league of Legends is the home of the most mentally ill people and thats why they are doing this ?
